get.summary: Gets the Peer Analysis for a Business.

parameters.name: Year
parameters.description: Year to get data for

parameters.name: Quarter
parameters.description: Quarter to get data for

parameters.name: SICCode
parameters.description: SIC Code to filter by

parameters.name: SICPrimary
parameters.description: Filter by Primary SIC Code only or Primary and Secondary SIC Codes (Y/N)

parameters.name: FolderId
parameters.description: Portfolio FolderId

parameters.name: TargetCountry
parameters.description: Two Letter country code

parameters.name: RiskLevelFilter
parameters.description: Risk Level (NS - Non-Scored / FS - Non-FRISK Scored / H1 - Risk Level 1 / H2 - Risk Level 1 and 2 / H3 - Risk Level 1, 2 and 3 / H4 - Risk Level 1, 2, 3 and 4 / H5 - Risk Level 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 / FS - FRISK Scored / FH - FRISK High Risk / FM - FRISK Medium Risk / FL - FRISK Low Risk / F1 - FRISK 1 (Highest Risk) / F2 - FRISK 2 / F3 - FRISK 3 / F4 - FRISK 4 / F5 - FRISK 5 / F6 - FRISK 7 / F8 - FRISK 8 / F9 - FRISK 9 / F10 - FRISK 10 (Lowest Risk))

parameters.name: ZScoreFilter
parameters.description: Filter by ZScore (N - Non Scored/ S - Scored / H - High Risk / M - Medium Risk / L - Low Risk)

parameters.name: PayceScoreFilter
parameters.description: Filter by PAYCE Score (N - Non - PAYCE Scored / S - PAYCE Scored / H - PAYCE Score High Risk / M - PAYCE Score Medium Risk / L - PAYCE Score Low Risk)

parameters.name: DBTFilter
parameters.description: Filter by DBT (S - Scored Customers / N - Non-Scored Customers / D - Delinquent / W - Slow / P - Prompt / 1 - (160+ days beyond terms) / 2 - (91 - 105 days beyond terms) / 3 - (76 - 90 days beyond terms) / 4  - (61 - 75 days beyond terms) / 5 - (46 - 60 days beyond terms) / 6 - (31 - 45 days beyond terms)  / 7 - 2(1 - 30 days beyond terms) / 8 - (11 - 20 days beyond terms) / 9 - (0 - 10 days beyond terms) / 10 - (no past due balances for six periods))

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Business ID

parameters.name: CustomerId
parameters.description: If you are a Trade Provider you can use your CustomerId to idenfity a Business with the CustomerId parameter.

parameters.name: SupplierId
parameters.description: If you have a Supplier List you can use your SupplierId to identify a Business with the SupplierId parameter.

parameters.name: AvgTrans
parameters.description: The average amount you expect to sell to this customer per month.

parameters.name: TransLimit
parameters.description: The maximum number of months of sales outstanding that you will tolerate from this customer (1 or more).

parameters.name: LossLimit
parameters.description: Sets an upper limit on the probability-weighted loss from this customer.

parameters.name: ExistingCreditLimit
parameters.description: Your current credit limit for this customer.

parameters.name: MonitorHi
parameters.description: Alert me if maximum limit goes ABOVE this value.

parameters.name: MonitorLo
parameters.description: Alert me if maximum limit goes BELOW this value.

parameters.name: RiskApp
parameters.description: Select the level of risk that is consistent with your credit strategy. (HIGH, MED, LOW)

parameters.name: CostOfCapital
parameters.description: Your cost of capital.

parameters.name: SaleGrossMargin
parameters.description: Your expected Gross Profit Margin from sales to this customer.

parameters.name: MonitorFlag
parameters.description: Select if you want automatic email alerts on this credit limit.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: BusinessId of the Business to get a Credit Limit for.

parameters.name: CustomerId
parameters.description: If you are a Trade Provider you can use your CustomerId to idenfity a Business with the CustomerId parameter.

parameters.name: SupplierId
parameters.description: If you have a Supplier List you can use your SupplierId to identify a Business with the SupplierId parameter.

get.summary: Searches for a Business.

parameters.name: BusinessName
parameters.description: Name of a Business to search for

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Number of rows to return

parameters.name: MatchType
parameters.description: How to match the Business. NM: Name Match. PN: Phone Match. TS: Ticker Symbol Match. TI: TaxId Match TW: Ticker Symbol Wildcard Match.

parameters.name: StreetAddress
parameters.description: Street Address to search against

parameters.name: CityName
parameters.description: City Name to search against

parameters.name: ProvinceName
parameters.description: State / Province to search against

parameters.name: PostalCode
parameters.description: Zip / Postal code to search against

parameters.name: CountryCode
parameters.description: Two digit code of the country

parameters.name: PhoneNumber
parameters.description: Phone Number to search against.

parameters.name: TickerSymbol
parameters.description: Ticker Symbol to search against.

parameters.name: FederalTaxId
parameters.description: Federal Tax Id to search against.

parameters.name: Threshold
parameters.description: Match Threshold

parameters.name: SearchUniverse
parameters.description: A: All businesses. P: Public companies only.

get.summary: Gets the list of Trade Providers

post.summary:
Sets the Trade Provider Id to use if more than one are available.
Necessary for referencing a Business by CustomerId if there are more than 1 Trade Provider Ids on a user account.

parameters.name: TradeProviderId
parameters.description: The TradeProviderId to use

get.summary: Returns Trade Provider accounts.

parameters.name: Layout
parameters.description: The subset of data to return. Layout=all returns all fields. Layout=scores returns only scores.

parameters.name: FromDate
parameters.description: Results will only include Businesses that have had changes since this date. Leave NULL to return all Businesses.

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: The username of the user to login

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password of the user to login

parameters.name: LinkBasedMFA
parameters.description: When set to "Y" and the User has 2FA enabled the login will send a clickable link to the user instead of a One Time Code. Default: "N".

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: The key recieved from /v1/Users/2FAKey when the User account is setup for Browser/Device verification.

get.summary: Gets the User Info for the currently logged in user

post.summary: Accepts a Two Factor Authentication Key

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: The One Time Password that was sent to the users phone.

ParentBusinessId.description: BusinessId of the Parent Business if this Business is a subsidiary

ParentBusinessName.description: Name of the Parent Business if this Business is a subsidiary

PostalCode.description: Zip / Postal code for the Business

IncorporatedIn.description: Country Code the Business was incorporated in

IncorporatedInState.description: State / Province the Business was incorporated in

FederalTaxId.description: Federal Tax Id for the Business

CIKNumber.description: Central Index Key for the Business

StockExchange.description: Stock Exchange the Business is on

Employees.description: Number of Employees the Business has

EmployeesAsOfDate.description: Date the Number of Employees is accurate as of

PAYCEScoreDate.description: Date the PAYCE Score was calculated

FriskScoreDate.description: Date the FRISK Score was calculated

DBTIndexDate.description: Date the DBT Index was calculated

FSRScoreDate.description: Date the FSR Score was calculated

HighRiskLink.description: URL for the High Risk Story

MarketGuideIndustryName.description: Name of the Industry the Business is in

CreditLimitMedian.description: Median point of the Credit Limit Range

CreditLimitVeryHigh.description: Very High point of the Credit Limit Range

pubDate.description: Published Date of the News Story

Name.description: The name of the NAICS Code
The name of the SIC Code

Primary.description: If this SIC Code is the Businesses primary SIC Code

AverageFRISKScore.description: Average FRISK Score for this Year and Month

APISubsidiary.description: Holds a Subsidiary for the API

StockVolatility.description: A measure of the amount by which a company's daily stock price fluctuates over a trailing 6 month period, with greater weighting given to the recent months

Leverage.description: A calculation of Leverage and Debt Coverage. Leverage is Total Liabilities divided by Total Assets, and is typically between 0 and 1.4.  A lower value is better.

LatestStatementDate.description: The date of the financials used in the credit limit calculations.

Rationale.description: Comments/Rational related to the credit limit.

AvgTransaction.description: The average amount you expect to sell to this customer per month.

TransactionLimit.description: The maximum number of months of sales outstanding that you will tolerate from this customer (1 or more).

MaxExpectedLossLimit.description: Upper limit on the probability-weighted loss from this customer.

RiskAppetite.description: Level of risk that is consistent with your credit strategy (HIGH, MED, or LOW)

GrossMargin.description: Your expected Gross Profit Margin from sales to this customer

ExistingCreditLimit.description: Your current credit limit for this customer.

MonitorFlag.description: Automatic monitoring (A - Automatic, Y - Manual, N - No monitoring)

MonitorHi.description: Alert me if maximum limit goes ABOVE this value

MonitorLo.description: Alert me if maximum limit goes BELOW this value

CurrencyCode.description: The Currency Code of this Business (USD, GBP, JPY, etc)

APIBusiness.description: Holds a Business for the API

PostalCode.description: Zip / Postal code for the Business

CountryCode.description: Two digit Country Code for the Business

IncorporatedIn.description: City the Business was Incorporated In

IncorporatedInState.description: State the Business was Incorporated In

StockExchange.description: Stock Exchange the Business is in

FederalTaxId.description: Federal Tax Id for the Business

CIKNumber.description: Central Index Key for the Business

LatestStatementDate.description: Date of the Latest Statement for the Business

Employees.description: Number of Employees in the Business

EmployeesAsOfDate.description: Date the Number of Employees is accurate as of

MoodysIssuerCount.description: If the Business has a Moodys Rating

FitchRatingCount.description: If the Business has a Fitch Rating

BankruptcyCount.description: Count of Bankruptcies for the Business

JudgmentCount.description: Count of Judgements for the Business

LienCount.description: Count of Liens for the Business

BusinessNewsCount.description: Count of News for the Business

ParentBusinessId.description: The BusinessId of the Parent Business if this Business is a Subsidiary

RelatedBusinesses.description: The Name and ID of businesses connected to the story

FRISKLastChangeDate.description: Date when the FRISKScore last changed

ZScoreLastChangeDate.description: Date when the ZScore was last changed

FSRScoreLastChangeDate.description: Date when the FSRScore was last changed

DBTIndex.description: Days Beyond Terms Index of the Business

PAYCELastChangeDate.description: Date when the PAYCEScore last changed

FinancialsLastChangeDate.description: Date when the Financials were last changed

UserId.description: UserId of the User that owns this Folder

CurrentTradeProvider.description: True if this is the currently selected Trade Provider

SessionKey.description: The Session Key for the user. This Session Key must be sent in the header of all subsequent calls.

Username.description: Username for the logged in user.

TwoFactorAuthenticationRequired.description: True when Two Factor Authentication is required for this login. A One Time Password will be sent to the phone number on record for the user account. Make a subsiquent request to the /v1/Users/2FAKey endpoint with the One Time Password to complete Two Factor Authentication.

Key.description: When the User account is setup for Device/Browser verification this field will contain a value. Send this value with subsequent requests to /v1/Users/LoginBrowser to remember 2FA verification requests.
